"It's fun time once again! Storieee...z

What is a story? It is an idea. It can be related to what we do, or it can be purely imagination. Or it can be about you. 

You will now meet two wonderful children. Just like you

Veena and Vinay are looking for something to do.

They find painters busy in their house and garden. And each one wants to paint.

See what happens when two different people start painting. 

Have you experienced such a thing? Do you do things differently from your brother or sister? 

Let's see how their mother deals with it. "
